front.title: Applicability of LDP Multi-Topology for Unicast Fast-reroute Using Maximally Redundant Trees

abstract.t: In this document, procedures' considerations on the applicability of LDP MT for unicast fast-reroute using MRT are provided. The behaviors of label allocation and label forwarding entry setup with LDP Multi-Topology and MRT fast-reroute are described in details. Different application scenarios of the combining of the LDP multi- topology(MT) and unicast fast-reroute using Maximally Redundant Trees(MRT) are also analyzed.
